home.title: See Clearly.
home.subtitle: Welcome to Visuar, your first step towards better vision. Start a quick, intuitive test or manage your profile.

login.title: Welcome Back
login.subtitle: Login to continue your vision journey.
login.loginError: Failed to login. Please check your credentials.

signup.title: Create Account
signup.subtitle: Join Visuar to track your vision health.
signup.signupError: Failed to create account. Please try again.

testSelection.title: Choose Your Vision Test
testSelection.subtitle: Select individual tests to focus on specific aspects of your vision health.
testSelection.completeAssessmentDesc: Take all tests in one comprehensive evaluation
testSelection.snellenAcuityDesc: Test your ability to see fine details at various distances using standard Snellen chart.
testSelection.contrastSensitivityDesc: Measure your ability to distinguish between subtle differences in shading and contrast.
testSelection.orientationDiscriminationDesc: Evaluate your ability to identify and distinguish different orientations and angles.
testSelection.rapidRecognitionDesc: Test your visual processing speed and ability to quickly recognize patterns and objects.
testSelection.sustainedFocusDesc: Assess your ability to maintain visual focus and attention over extended periods.
testSelection.blurToleranceDesc: Measure how well you can interpret slightly blurred or defocused visual information.
testSelection.nearFarSwitchingDesc: Test your eyes' ability to quickly adjust focus between near and far distances.

test.cameraMessage: This test uses your webcam to analyze eye movement patterns. Your privacy is protected - no video is stored.
test.cameraDenied: Camera access was denied. Please enable camera permissions in your browser settings.
test.maintainFocus: Please maintain focus on the screen
test.instruction2: Ensure your face is well-lit and clearly visible
test.instruction3: Keep your head steady and follow on-screen prompts
test.healthMessage: Your vision assessment shows good overall health with some areas for potential improvement.
test.excellentResult: Excellent! Your vision is in great shape.
test.goodResult: Good performance! Keep monitoring your vision health.
test.fairResult: Fair. Consider consulting an eye care professional.
test.poorResult: We recommend consulting an eye care professional.
test.healthMessage: Your vision assessment shows good overall health with some areas for potential improvement.
test.finding1Desc: Your blink rate is slightly higher than average, which may indicate mild digital eye strain from extended screen use.
test.finding2Desc: Your eye tracking shows stable gaze patterns with minimal deviation, indicating healthy eye muscle coordination.
test.recommendation1: Take regular breaks using the 20-20-20 rule: every 20 minutes, look at something 20 feet away for 20 seconds
test.recommendation2: Consider adjusting screen brightness and contrast to reduce eye strain
test.recommendation3: Ensure proper ambient lighting when using digital devices
test.recommendation4: Schedule a comprehensive eye exam with an optometrist within the next 6 months

forgotPassword.title: Reset Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email to receive a password reset link
forgotPassword.resetSuccess: Password reset link sent! Check your email.
forgotPassword.resetError: Failed to send reset link. Please try again.
